tuv.seg: Citizens Information Phone Service
Seirbhís Ghutháin um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh
If you have a question that has not been answered by the content on this website, you can contact the Citizens Information Phone Service on 0761 07 4000 (Monday to Friday, 9am to 8pm)

Má tá ceist agat nár fhuair tú freagra uirthi in ábhar an tsuímh idirlíne seo, is féidir leat glao a chur ar an tSeirbhís Ghutháin um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh 0761 07 4000 (Luan go hAoine idir 9rn agus 8in)
Citizens Information Phone Service
An tSeirbhís Ghutháin um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh
You can also visit your local Citizens Information Centre, which provides a free and confidential service
Cuireann Ionaid Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh seirbhís ar fáil atá saor in aisce agus faoi rún
(Call costs to 0761 numbers vary – your telephone service provider should be able to give you further details on the costs that apply for your telephone package.)

(Bíonn difríochtaí idir chostais i leith ghlaonna 0761 – féadfaidh do sholáthróir seirbhíse teileafóin tuilleadh sonraí a thabhairt duit maidir leis na costais a bhaineann le do phacáiste teileafóin.)
You can contact the Citizens Information website team by post or telephone at:
Is féidir leat dul i dteagmháil le foireann an tsuímh Fhaisnéise do Shaoránaigh tríd an bpost nó ar an teileafón ag:
Teileafón: 0761 07 9000
You can also send feedback in relation to citizensinformation.ie to ciofeedback@ciboard.ie
Is féidir seol aiseolas maidir le citizensinformation.ie freisin chuig ciofeedback@ciboard.ie
Please note that email is not generally considered to be a secure form of communication
Tabhair faoi deara le do thoil, go ginearálta, nach mbreathnaítear ar ríomhphoist mar fhoirm shlán cumarsáide
